data.title: What are you reading?
data.meta_description:
@ Turk: That´s very good.Reading this Forum is more than cool!!!
 
I´m just finish with reading "The Hobbit".Now i read "The Green Mile".
data.text:
I always have about 2 or 3 books I'm reading at any given time. I've decided to downsize, so most of my collection is now on audiobook (mp3 format) Here's a list (slightly out of date) of my audiobooks. Some I haven't yet listened to and some I have, decided they were garbage and have since deleted. I would say that most of these I have either listened to, or have read. If the list looks a little confusing, it's because the forum board does not use tabs or indents.
